title: The Ravages of Time (MANGA) English Version_C1~C372 By CanonDev
description:
Note: I updated it to the most recent chapter, C372. The series is still continuing.

Description: A re-imagined historical war epic in the form of a Manga chronicle. The original tale was known for surviving through village folklores.

It was popular even back then. The story was often exaggerated, expanded. Creating a fictional image for the historical figure that had existed in that period, turns them into icons that lives in video games, popular cultures. And here it's compilated, and gone through many writer's care to actually re-animate what's not impossible into a chronicle with excellent detail.

This Manga chronicle is the ultimate collection for any history war buff that recognized the attraction in the folktales that was spawned from the actual War period. The author had turned the myth into flesh and blood that exist between the pages.

Needless to say, I'm a huge fan of the fictional content that's originated from this time period.

Credit -

P.S Enjoy. Please seed.
